issue.title: The latest tagged version of BLACS doesn't play nice with the latest tagged labscript_utils

content.raw:
I think tip is as good as can reasonably be expected. It's not like there is experimental work happening in default at the moment, and we don't have much reason to think any past commit is more stable since we don't maintain a 'stable' branch to backport fixes to. 

Do you want to tag tip as 2.3.0?
content.html:
